title: Community Park Cleanup
details: A community-driven cleanup initiative focused on removing waste, trimming overgrown plants, and restoring the natural beauty of Ramna Park. Volunteers will work in teams to ensure a cleaner and greener environment for everyone to enjoy.

title: Public Health Awareness Camp
details: A health awareness program offering free checkups, basic diagnostics, and expert consultations. Participants will receive guidance on nutrition, exercise, mental wellness, and preventive healthcare to promote a healthier lifestyle.

title: Charity Book Fair
details: A charity book fair aimed at promoting literacy and supporting underprivileged students. Visitors can donate books, buy from a wide selection of affordable titles, and participate in reading sessions and storytelling activities.
